des:
If you have any problem when you use this skill, you can contact our tech team on: csplus@scolmore.com
Click Smart + helps you control smart appliance’s using voice control and/or control directly from the app.

You can simply ask Alexa to turn on, turn off or dim the light, depending on the smart products installed.
There’s no need to go to the switch to power your socket - just ask Alexa “turn on hallway smart socket”. 

Connect Alexa to your Click Smart+ products in a few simple steps
(1). Download our "Click Smart+" app in Android Play Store or iOS App Store
(2). Register your details using the "Click Smart+" app
(3). You need to have at least one Click Smart+ device installed and powered
(4). Configure these devices in our "Click Smart+" app and change appropriate name of your devices which will then be used for Alexa voice control. e.g Hallway Smart Socket 
(5). If the Alexa device is not setup, download the “Alexa” app from Android Play Store or iOS App Store
(6). Configure your Alexa Device with the Alexa app.
(7). On your smart device tap Add + Set up device and follow on screen instructions
(8). Input your account username and password, you'll be redirected to the success page
(9). Now all setup is finished. 

You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
“Alexa, turn on Smart Socket"
“Alexa, turn on Hallway Lamp"
“Alexa, turn on Kitchen Light"
“Alexa, turn off Kitchen Light"
“Alexa, turn on Lounge Light"
“Alexa, turn off Lounge Light"
“Alexa, set the Lounge Light to 20 percent"

All devices are shown individually on the Alexa app enabling manual control and voice control from the app.

Routines can also be setup which enables multiple devices to be controlled by a single voice command.
